item.description:
Hello:

We thought you might be interested in a presentation we are offering at the Ridgefield Community Center (Lounsbury House) on Wednesday, April 22, at 6:30 PM.

WCSU professor, Dr. Kevin Gutzman, author of the New York Times bestseller, The Politically Incorrect Guide to the Constitution and co-author of Who Killed the Constitution?, will be the featured speaker.

Dr. Gutzman is associate professor of American history at Western Connecticut State University. While challenging many myths that have been accepted as fact, Dr. Gutzman discusses how fundamental Constitutional principles have been undermined. His perspective is insightful and thought provoking. The presentation is a must for anyone who is interested in the evolution of our national economy and political culture. A period for book signings and questions and answers will follow Dr. Gutzmanâ€™s planned presentation.

Dr. Gutzman received his J.D. and M.P.Aff. from Texas (1990) and his M.A. and Ph.D. from Virginia (1999).

I am attaching a copy of the ad that will be in the Ridgefield Press this Thursday. There will be no admission charge. All are welcome.

I hope you can make it.

Feel free to pass this information along to others.

Thanks

Richard Land
